str2: In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
An act of will, will; plur: wishes, desires. From the prolonged form of ethelo; a determination, i.e. choice or inclination.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular

str2: To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Joy, gladness, a source of joy. From chairo; cheerfulness, i.e. Calm delight.

word: and together with you be refreshed.
parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Middle - 1st Person Singular
str2: To rest along with. Middle from sun and anapano; to recruit oneself in company with.
